sent.orig: Reporter wants the extroversion, because reporter must frequently the going out work.
sent.trans: 记者要外向，因为记者要经常出外工作。

sent.orig: Later on, propaganda officials tailedthe reporter by car out and pulled the reporter over for questioning.
sent.trans: 随后，宣传部门官员跟随记者离开该镇，又对记者进行了询问。

sent.orig: But when reporter interviews Wang Nan time, is being on one's honeymoon she denied this news.
sent.trans: 但当记者采访王楠本人的时候，正在度蜜月的她否认了这个消息。

sent.orig: Report from our correspondent (reporter Zhao Jin) agency refuse sells Nuojiya event have new progress again.
sent.trans: 本报讯（记者赵谨）经销商拒卖诺基亚事件又有新进展。

sent.orig: A reporter posed a simple question, "Do you trust him? "
sent.trans: 一名记者提出一个很简单的问题：“您信任他吗？”
